Room.Name: Advanced Range
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the advanced training range in the Dentra Central Archery Range.
Room.LongDescription: This area of the archery range is restricted to only the best archers in the lands, so that they can practice without having to worry about others less talented interfeering with them. Most of the archers are pretty stuck up and may actually attack non-archers when they enter the facility.
